title: Closet space
body:
If someone where to come out on league, what would you say?


P.s: I am not coming out as gay with this post, I am interested in hearing opinions.

replies.body: I first came out on League, lmao.

> [{quoted}](name=Bipolar,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0pInnvYM,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:59:21.335+0000)
>
> I first came out on League, lmao.

fair enough
Wtf does the post even mean lol

> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0pInnvYM,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-05-27T10:12:21.441+0000)
>
> Wtf does the post even mean lol

Its a question? Does it have to have a meaning. Kek

> [{quoted}](name=Best Viktor AU,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0pInnvYM,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2015-05-27T10:50:29.446+0000)
>
> Well what's he asking?

""If someone where to come out on league, what would you say?""
> If someone ~~where~~ were  to come out on league, what would you say?

> [{quoted}](name=Corki did 911,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0pInnvYM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-27T10:01:17.636+0000)
>
> OP is a faggot whether he's gay or not, who gives a fuck

You make 0 sense

You don't have to be gay to be a faggot dude.

do you even south park?

It's a game, I don't care if you're gay, trans, bi, a woman or a man. I don't give a shit, don't tell me.

I don't want to know. I want to win.
Personally, I don't think anyone would give a damn. If people did, they are a very minute minority.
i'd say good for you, no one cares
I always see corki did 911 and shuffled pancake commenting on my posts... Like regulars at a bar

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0pInnvYM,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-27T10:04:12.643+0000)
>
> I always see corki did 911 and shuffled pancake commenting on my posts... Like regulars at a bar

Oh i respond to (imo) relevant topics, toxic or not i reply lol :D
Except I don't go to gay bars

> [{quoted}](name=Corki did 911,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0pInnvYM,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-05-27T10:05:02.310+0000)
>
> Except I don't go to gay bars

http://cdn.meme.am/instances/250x250/62549894.jpg
Truthfully?, they wouldnt. but if they did no one would care/believe them imo.
